tool_description:
Heritage Pixel API is a revolutionary tool for restoring and enhancing old and damaged photos, especially faces. Our state-of-the-art algorithm uses advanced machine learning techniques, trained on a large dataset of faces, to restore and reconstruct faces with realistic and faithful details. With Heritage Pixel, you can easily restore family photos, historical documents, group photos, and bring back people's faces to life.

Our API is easy to use and integrates seamlessly with your existing ...
name: AI-powered Photo Restoration
title: AI-powered Photo Restoration

api_list.name: Restore pictures
api_list.description: Send a correct picture, ideally your pictures is cropped and center to subject
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-powered-photo-restoration.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-powered-photo-restoration.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://ai-powered-photo-restoration.p.rapidapi.com/"

print(response.json())
